headline: Broadcom Launches VMware Cloud Foundation 9.0 for Unified Private Cloud Management
summary: Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) ranks among the best FAANG stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On June 17, Broadcom Inc. (NASDAQ:AVGO) announced that VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF) 9.0, a platform made for contemporary private cloud environments, was now generally available. The company claims that the new platform offers a uniform operating paradigm for private cloud […]

headline: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) Expands AI-Driven Product Line With Key Acquisitions And Upgrades
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) recently unveiled an array of AI-driven enterprise products alongside acquiring the VeloCloud SD-WAN portfolio from Broadcom. This strategic expansion could have supported the company's share price performance, which surged by 23% over the last quarter. During the same period, Arista appointed Todd Nightingale as President and COO, and initiated a substantial share buyback program. These events likely added weight to the broader upward market trend, driven by tech...

headline: Nvidia reclaimed market value pole position in June
summary: However, Nvidia's market value has yet to surpass Apple Inc's record high of about $3.92 trillion set in December 2024.  Meta Platforms Inc, Broadcom Inc, and Amazon.com Inc saw their market values rise by 14%, 13.9%, and 7% respectively last month, reaching $1.86 trillion, $1.3 trillion, and $2.33 trillion.
